title: Death Note
summary: A high school student gains the power to kill anyone whose name he writes in a mysterious notebook, leading to a cat-and-mouse battle with a genius detective.

title: Psycho-Pass
summary: In a dystopian future, law enforcement uses a system that can predict people's criminal intent, but a new detective questions its morality.

title: Steins;Gate
summary: A mad scientist and his friends discover time travel and face the consequences of tampering with time and their own destinies.

title: Monster
summary: A renowned surgeon saves a young boy's life, only to discover that the boy grows up to become a sociopath who wreaks havoc across Europe.

title: Erased
summary: A young man with the ability to travel back in time must use his powers to prevent a series of tragic events, including a childhood friend's murder.

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
summary: Teenagers piloting giant robots defend Earth from mysterious beings, while dealing with personal and emotional struggles.

title: Paranoia Agent
summary: A series of mysterious attacks by a boy with a golden bat creates chaos, as the victims confront their darkest secrets.

title: The Tatami Galaxy
summary: A university student explores different timelines as he tries to make the most out of his campus life and find happiness.

title: The Perfect Insider
summary: A university professor and a student investigate a locked-room murder mystery involving a genius researcher on a remote island.

title: Kaiji: Ultimate Survivor
summary: A down-on-his-luck man must navigate deadly gambling games to clear his debts, facing psychological warfare and intense stakes.
